parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of displays states for this configuration

title: IConfiguration.IGetDisplayStates
description: Gets the names of the display states for this configuration.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of displays states for this configuration

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of names of the display states for this configuration VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IConfiguration::GetDisplayStatesCount
to determine the size of array for the output.
